name: Town Anew - Purok Buko
description:
Purok Buko, your hometown, is devastated by an unexpected super typhoon. Join the town’s rebuilding efforts as the newly-trained Panday scion, as well as their search for identity, solidarity, and meaning in between disasters.

Forecasts report another super typhoon, approaching in about two weeks. The town’s fate rests in your collective hands. Can you avert disaster and aid in returning normalcy, raising the town anew?

-----

A simulation-visual novel video game project, which served as a CAPSTN submission to the IEMC Department of De La Salle College of Saint Benilde.

Submitted by:

Agustin, Elijah Francis - Designer, Producer, Lead Researcher, Narrative Designer

Bona, Mark Jericho - Lead Programmer, Researcher

Cardano, Emmanuel - Programmer, Researcher

Co, Christian Gabriel - Lead Artist, Researcher

Nantes, Domnic  Carlo - Artist, Researcher
